com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.manager

Class MetadataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.manager.MetadataManager

  • public class MetadataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains APIs to fetch Salesforce object metadata, recently used objects, and other object related data.
    Author:
    bhariharan

      • loadMRUObjects

        public java.util.List<SalesforceObject> loadMRUObjects(java.lang.String objectTypeName,
                                                       int limit,
                                                       CacheManager.CachePolicy cachePolicy,
                                                       long refreshCacheIfOlderThan,
                                                       java.lang.String networkFieldName)
        Returns a list of MRU objects based on object type.
        Parameters:
        objectTypeName - Object type name (set to 'null' for global MRU).
        limit - Limit on number of objects (max is 'MAX_QUERY_LIMIT').
        cachePolicy - Cache policy.
        refreshCacheIfOlderThan - Time interval to refresh cache.
        networkFieldName - Network field name for this object type.
        Returns:
        List of recently accessed objects.
